With the help of his best friend Ron Weasley and his mysterious teacher Hermione Granger, Harry embarks on a series of magical adventures in order to defeat his arch-nemesis- Lord Voldemort. 

2. "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring" (2001) - Directed by Peter Jackson, this epic film tells the story of Frodo Baggins, an orphaned hobbit who inherits a great responsibility from his eccentric uncle- Gandalf. With the help of his loyal friend Samwise Gamgee and his wise wizard advisor Gandalf, Frodo embarks on a series of magical adventures in order to destroy the powerful One Ring that was created by the evil Dark Lord Sauron. 

In summary, "Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone" (1997) and "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring" (2001) are two highly-rated movies in the fantasy genre that you might enjoy.
